issue.title: Metadata edition form : multiple select list always has empty option selected by default
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

In the metadata edition form, a multiple select list always has an empty option selected by default,

This is a problem when applying form validation with cardinality check : a multiple list with a lower cardinality bound > 0 will pass the check even if the user didn't select anything.
